metadata.title: CVE-2023-32727 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker who has the privilege to configure Zabbix items can usefunction icmpping() with additional malicious command inside it to executearbitrary code on the current Zabbix server.

criterions.comment: zabbix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
